nodeMetric.field_description: Privacy Consent Approves tracks the number of people who have explicitly chosen to receive email communications.

body.summary: Privacy Consent Approves tracks the number of people who have explicitly chosen to receive email communications.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Privacy Consent Declines tracks the number of people who have explicitly chosen not to receive email communications.

Email Unsubscribes is the count of how many users unsubscribe from your email distributions over a defined time period. It helps your understand the health of your email distribution list and the effectiveness of your email communications.
